fixed_skill.desc: Increase 1 ally's Attack by 15.5%/16.3%/17.0%. For every 500 of the user's Attack, increase the target's Attack by 1.3%/1.4%/1.4% more, up to 10.4%/10.9%/11.4%. Lasts for 3 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Tarukaja

innate_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 116.4/122.2/128.0% of Attack.
innate_skill.name: Cleave

passive_skill.desc: Increase Defense by 5.3%. Decrease weakness damage by 24%.
passive_skill.name: Duke's Intimidation

passive_skill.desc: Increase Defense by 5.3%. Decrease weakness damage by 28%.
passive_skill.name: Duke's Intimidation I

showtime_skill.desc: Increase party's damage by 29.5%/31.6%/33.6% for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
